name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience in software development, specializing in high-performance solutions with a focus on **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **Postgres**. Proficient in building and deploying cloud-native applications using **AWS**, and containerization with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Strong expertise in CI/CD practices with **GitLab**, ensuring streamlined development processes and faster delivery cycles. Experienced in modern front-end frameworks such as **Next.js**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, allowing for versatile full stack capabilities when needed.

Possess hands-on expertise in building enterprise platforms with robust architecture, integrating AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and automation. Skilled in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, while strictly adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about utilizing technologies to create impactful systems and solutions that drive efficiency and growth.

•	Engaged in cross-functional collaborations to innovate and enhance service offerings, incorporating feedback from stakeholders into the development lifecycle for products tailored to end-user needs.
•	Conducted performance tuning and optimization initiatives within server-side operations, achieving measurable improvements in data processing speeds and query response times.
